amendment.description: To prohibit excessive deployments overseas of members of the Guard and Reserves.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1244 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 31. Record Vote Number: 277.
Amendment SA 1244 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S9371-9391; text: CR S9373) To prohibit excessive deployments overseas of members of the Guard and Reserves.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1244 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 31. Record Vote Number: 277.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1244 proposed by Senator Byrd.
